byline.contributor: Maggie Haberman contributed reporting from Cleveland, and Megan Twohey and Russ Buettner from New York. Kitty Bennett contributed research.

abstract: Profile of Meredith McIver, in-house staff writer at Trump Organization; McIver has taken blame for writing Melania Trump's speech at Republican National Convention, which appears to have been plagiarized from Michelle Obama's speech at 2008 Democratic National Convention.
lead_paragraph: Meredith McIver, a longtime employee of the Trump Organization, said that she had offered her resignation over what she called an innocent mistake, but that Donald J. Trump refused to accept it.

headline.main: Behind Melania Trump’s Cribbed Lines, an Ex-Ballerina Who Loved Writing
headline.print_headline: For Trusted Trump Tower Insider, Longtime Passion for Writing Leads Into a Storm
